item.title: LET IT DIE: INFERNO limited-time demo for PC launches October 13
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Get a taste of the full gameplay loop.

A limited-time demo for roguelite survival action game LET IT DIE: INFERNO will be available for PC via Steam from October 13 at 10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET until October 21 at 10:00 a.m. PT / 1:00 p.m. ET as part of Steam Next Fest: October 2025 Edition, publisher GungHo Online Entertainment and developer Supertrick Games announced.

The announcement reads, “In the demo, you won’t just explore and battle through the chaotic depths of the Hell Gate—you’ll get a taste of the full gameplay loop. Visit Iron Perch to shop, upgrade your Body Mastery, and much more.”

LET IT DIE: INFERNO is due out for PlayStation 5 and PC via Steam on December 3.

Watch a new trailer and developer diary below.

item.title: SOPA: Tale of the Stolen Potato now available for PS5 alongside Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Narrative adventure game also available via Game Pass.

Emotional narrative adventure game SOPA: Tale of the Stolen Potato is now available for PlayStation 5 alongside its previously announced Xbox Series, Xbox One, and PC (Steam, Microsoft Store) versions for $19.99, developer Studio Bando announced. It is also available via Game Pass.

Here is an overview of the game, via its Steam page:

About

When Miho steps into the pantry to get a potato for his grandmothers’ soup, he’s pulled into a distant fantastical land where he must retrace the steps of a mysterious great traveler before him.

He must venture through a world of endless deserts, floating mountains, and talking beasts, outsmarting thieves and meeting quirky characters along the way.

But each time he returns to the kitchen with an ingredient, he’s a little bit taller, and his grandmother a little bit older…

Key Features

  • Beautiful narrative adventure inspired by Spirited Away, The Little Prince, and Coco.
  • Explore fantastic original worlds in full 3D Disney / Pixar-like art style.
  • Laugh-out-loud dialogue pulls you into the world.
  • Emotional subtext for a mature audience, while being fun and accessible to a younger one.
  • Solve puzzles, engage in quick-time events, learn songs.
  • Designed for multiplatform and accessibility.
  • 10 to 12-plus hours of gameplay.
  • Complete all sidequests and collect all the clay figurines!
  • Meet new characters and go on new adventures in upcoming downloadable content.
